attributes.additional_details: The government has shown plainly and very clearly that they do not care about what the citizens and constituents of their nation really want (See: Online Safety Act and Digital ID Cards). Keeping the petitions website live is a cruel way for the government to spit in the faces of the people they are meant to serve and continue down their ignorant paths.
attributes.background: If the Government will not listen to our voices when we try to make a noise about a decision that is disagreed with across the whole political spectrum, there is no point in keeping the Petitions website live.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Shut down the UK Government and Parliament Petitions system" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734870
